alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 1:49AM EDT until November 01 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 3 to 6 inches.. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The event is transitioning to a traditional lake effect snow event and snowfall rates of one inch per hour will be possible this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
